vulkanmod.options.uniqueOpaqueLayer.tool: Use a unique render layer for opaque terrain to improve performance. It changes some distant blocks aspect
vulkanmod.options.advCulling.tooltip: Use a culling algorithm that might improve performance by reducing the number of non visible chunk sections rendered.
vulkanmod.options.entityCulling.tooltip: Enables culling for entities on not visible sections.
vulkanmod.options.indirectDraw.tooltip: Reduces CPU overhead but increases GPU overhead. Enabling it might help in CPU limited systems.
vulkanmod.options.frameQueue.tooltip: Higher values might help stabilize frametime but will increase input lag.
vulkanmod.options.minSampleShading.toolt:
Min: (MSAA)

Enhances edges of blocks and objects only
Excludes text and texture detail
Performance Impact: Moderate/High


Max: (SSAA)

Enhances all visual elements
Including Edges as well as texture detail, objects, and text
EXTREMELY PERFORMANCE INTENSIVE
Performance Impact: Extremely High/Insane
vulkanmod.options.anisotropicFiltering.t:
Enhances details of distant textures, especially at a distance
Massively improves quality of mipmaps (Fixes mipmap blur)
Performance impact varies on texture count, Huge modpacks that add many blocks/items will have more overhead than smaller modpacks
Performance Impact: None/Extremely Low
